DOC.brief_summary: Unruptured saccular intracranial aneurysm large 7 mm treat endovascular occlusion use detachable coil , without expendable stent assistance . A new endovascular technique recently develop , use flow diverter stent without associate coil . Clinical result already publish encouraging confirm . Furthermore , medical device expensive comparison coil strategy . The purpose study compare clinical efficacy , safety , cost-effectiveness endovascular coiling endovascular flow diversion unrupted saccular intracranial aneurysm .
DOC.brief_title: Flow Diverter Stent Endovascular Treatment Unruptured Saccular Wide-necked Intracranial Aneurysms
DOC.detailed_description: Main Outcome Measure : Percentage patient aneurysm complete occlusion , define absence visible blood flow consideration angiography perform 12 month post-endovascular intervention .
